title: MOROCCANOIL The Original Oil Treatment 100ml/3.4fl.oz.
description: Moroccanoil is an ultra-light formula which is absorbed by the hair instantly, resulting in a natural, silky finish and brilliant shine. Moroccanoil has the ability to restore over-processed hair damaged by environmental factors and chemical procedures - it also revives, hydrates and detangles hair, wigs and hair extensions.

title: Alba Botanica Un-Petroleum Multi-Purpose Jelly, 3.5 Ounce Tube
description: Since 1979, Alba Botanica has offered natural, 100% vegetarian personal care products that do beautiful for you, your friends and the animals and Earth you love. This means we DON'T use parabens, sulfates, or phthalates. We make a full range of products packed with potent natural, botanical ingredients that are formulated to nourish the individualized needs of your skin and hair. Because the Alba Botanica is committed to the health and happiness of all furry friends, we never test our products, or the ingredients that go into them, on animals. We recognize the need to be good stewards of all natural resources. So we try to do beautiful by reducing our environmental impact in everything we do as a business, from the field to the final product. We hope that you join our do beautiful campaign. Together we can help to preserve and heal the planet, now and for future generations.

title: Trader Joe's Tea Tree Tingle Conditioner with Peppermint and Eucalyptus - Cruelty Free
description: We've worked with an upscale boutique to bring you this salon-quality conditioner that will rejuvenate your hair with its refreshing tingle. A blend of certified organic botanicals including peppermint and tea tree work together to moisturize and clarify your hair while alleviating dry scalp. Our product contains no laurel/laureth sulfates found in most shampoos and is suitable for all hair types.

title: Village Naturals Therapy Foaming Bath Oil, Aches & Pains, 16 oz.
description: Let Village Naturals TherapyTM Aches & Pains Liquid Mineral Bath make a house call. Soothe and comfort your body by soaking in a warm bath. Our therapeutic formula is enriched with vitamins, skin softening ingredients and aromatherapy vapors to help you feel better. Relax with ingredients that have been extracted from natural sources. This product contains Eucalyptus to soothe and revitalize, chamomile to calm and relax, and rosehips to comfort and renew.

title: Village Naturals Therapy Liquid Mineral Bath, Stress and Tension, 16 oz.
description: Village Naturals Therapy™ Juniper & Menthol Stress & Tension Relief Foaming Bath Oil & Body Wash.With essential oils & extracts.

title: Moroccan Oil Hair Treatment 3.4 Oz Bottle with Blue Box
description: Moroccanoil is an ultra-light formula which is absorbed by the hair instantly, resulting in a natural, silky finish and brilliant shine.  Moroccanoil has the ability to restore over-processed hair damaged by environmental factors and chemical procedures - it also revives, hydrates and detangles hair, wigs and hair extensions.

title: Tree Hut Shea Moisturizing Body Lotion, Coconut Lime, 9 Ounce (Pack of 2)
description: Renew your dull and tired skin with fresh scent of Coconut and Lime Tree Hut Extra-Rich Moisturizing Lotion. Natural Coconut and Lime extracts condition skin that has lost its sheen due to harsh products and chemicals. This extra-rich Shea body lotion, infused with certified organic Shea butter, Coconut and Lime extracts and Safflower Seed oil, was designed to hydrate and condition the skin with its light, non-greasy formula for a daily moisturization that will keep your skin looking silky smooth.
